# Synopsis

This website contains the teaching materials for STAT 415/615 Regression, taught at American 
University by [David Gerard](https://dcgerard.github.io/).

# Administrative

- Syllabus

# Lectures

- 01 Crash Course in R
  - R introduction, reading in data, data transformations
  - Plotting with `qplot()`
  - Chapter 2 of ROS
- 02 Review
  - Mathematical prerequisites
  - Distributions
  - Statistical inference.
  - Chapters 3 and 4 of ROS
- 03 Simple linear regression
  - Model
  - Estimation
  - Hypothesis testing
  - Assumptions
  - Transformations
  - Chapters 6, 7, and 8 of ROS
- 04 Multiple linear regression
  - Model/Interpretation (including interactions, indicators)
  - Estimation
  - Hypothesis Testing
  - Assumptions
  - Transformations
  - Chapters 10, 11, 12 of ROS
- 05 Design
  - Power
  - Sample size calculation
  - Chapter 16 ROS
- 06 Missing data
  - Chapters 17 of ROS
- 07 Causal Inference (if time permits)
  - Chapters 18 and 19 of ROS
